item.title: Phishing findings, campaign #3: ING bank
item.description: I started hunting and reporting phishing websites on Twitter: follow me here if you are interested! In this series of posts I am going to analyze and discuss some of the phishing kits found online. Let’s start from the beginning I found this kit while analyzing the phishing sites reported by @illegalfawn. The zip was left exposed in the page, I believe the malicious actor forgot to remove it.
